about_the_game:
Hi everyone! This is a casual puzzle game that simulates a claw machine.
In this game, you can experience a relaxing time. Move the joystick to press the button and collect the plush toys!

The dolls you obtain can be viewed on the collection shelf. There are 10 stages in total and 30 cute dolls with the same style waiting for you to collect!
The first 15 dolls are fixed in the level, and the rest need to be randomly captured in the free mode
After clearing the level, you can also experience various exquisite character illustrations as a reward.



Besides the doll, you can also experience the exquisitely crafted character animation in the DLC, as well as the same variety of stockings as always!
Now each character has an independent short story, and we have also added the long-awaited plot dubbing!
You can hear the voice lines of various girls, all differences and animations are dubbed!
The "hide" button now also hides the entire UI! You can even zoom in on animations using the scroll wheel!



Operation guide/manual
Move the grabbing claw by using the buttons or joysticks on the machine.
Position and adjust to move the claw to a suitable position so that it can clamp the target object when grabbing it.
When the claw is in the ideal position, press the button, and the claw will descend and try to clamp the target object.
Once the target object is clamped, the claw will start to rise, bringing the object out of the claw machine to get the doll.

Game features
The game difficulty is casual level, which is suitable for players who do not want to spend too much effort to pass the game.
I hope everyone will like this game.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: Doll Grabber-Patch
short_description: "Doll Grabber" is a casual puzzle game that simulates a claw machine. Players need to grab a specified number of dolls in each level. Come and challenge yourself!
